text:
[Verse]
Dancing shadows in the light
Moving fast out of sight
Whispers of the night
Hold on tight
Yeah that's right

[Verse 2]
Underneath the silver moon
Gonna dance till we're in tune
Every heartbeat's like a boom
Feel the magic
Coming soon

[Chorus]
Shadows move
Shadows play
In the night
They won't stray
In the dark
We're okay
Shadows dancing
Night to day

[Verse 3]
Feet are flying
Hands are high
Twist and turn
Touch the sky
Can't stop now
Don't ask why
In this moment
We can’t lie

[Verse 4]
Music pumping in our veins
Forget about the day's pains
All that's left
Joy remains
Life in shadows
No chains

[Bridge]
Oh-oh keep on moving
Feel the rhythm soothing
Every beat approving
Heart and soul uniting
title: Dancing Shadows
